revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt. Ember Summit |image = [[File:Mt. Ember Summit.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Mt. Ember Summit. |tokens = 1,750 |location = Sevii Island 1. }} '''Mt. Ember Summit''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 18,120 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Spearow.png|40px]] Spearow || rowspan=3|[[File:Pokémon Ranger (female).png|40px]] Pokémon Ranger Beth || rowspan=3|[[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout, [[File:Gloom.png|40px]] Gloom, [[File:Gloom.png|40px]] Gloom |- | [[File:Fearow.png|40px]] Fearow |- | [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machop |- | [[File:Machoke.png|40px]] Machoke || rowspan=3|[[File:Battle Girl.png|40px]] Crush Girl Jocelyn || rowspan=3|[[File:Hitmonchan.png|40px]] Hitmonchan, [[File:Hitmonchan.png|40px]] Hitmonchan |- | [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude |- | [[File:Graveler.png|40px]] Graveler |- | [[File:Ponyta.png|40px]] Ponyta || rowspan=2|[[File:Pokémon Ranger (male).png|40px]] Pokémon Ranger Logan || rowspan=2|[[File:Exeggcute.png|40px]] Exeggcute, [[File:Exeggutor.png|40px]] Exeggutor |- | [[File:Rapidash.png|40px]] Rapidash |}

<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:9-->
<!--T:10--> After Reaching Sinnoh, the drop chance for items in Kanto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
